entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5 except minus 9 inland. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023
